hero.title: Report your damage
hero.subtitle: Skado makes car damage reporting fast and reliable.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to complete your damage report
howItWorks.step1Desc: Simply take photos of the damage using your phone camera
howItWorks.step2Desc: Our AI instantly creates a detailed damage report for you
howItWorks.step3Desc: Submit your report directly to your insurance company

trust.title: As efficient as a tech startup — as trustworthy as an insurance company
trust.description: Skado combines cutting-edge technology with insurance-grade reliability to give you the best of both worlds.
trust.securityDesc: Your data is encrypted and protected

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join thousands who've simplified their accident reporting process

footer.tagline: Making car accident reporting simple, fast, and trustworthy.

login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Sign in to continue to your account
login.terms: By signing in, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

register.title: Create Account
register.subtitle: Sign up to get started with your account
register.terms: By creating an account, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

step1.label: Photos
step1.title: Upload Accident Photos
step1.description: Take clear photos of vehicle damage, license plates, and the accident scene. Multiple angles help provide better documentation.
step1.dropzone: Drop photos here or click to browse
step1.supportedFormats: Supports JPEG, PNG up to 10MB each

step2.label: License Plate
step2.title: Vehicle License Plate
step2.description: Enter the license plate number of your vehicle or use our scanner for automatic detection.
step2.pointCamera: Point your camera at the license plate

step3.label: Description
step3.title: Describe the Incident
step3.description: Provide a brief description of what happened. Be clear and factual.
step3.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe what happened during the accident...
step3.selectTemplate: Select a template to get started:
step3.template1: Rear-ended while stopped at traffic light

step4.label: Vehicle Info
step4.title: Vehicle Ownership Information
step4.description: Please specify your relationship to the vehicle involved in the accident.
step4.question: Who owns this vehicle?

step5.label: Location
step5.title: Accident Location
step5.description: We'll capture the GPS coordinates of the accident location for accurate reporting.
step5.consent: I consent to sharing my location data
step5.consentDesc: Your location will be used only for this accident report and stored securely. This helps provide accurate documentation for insurance and legal purposes.
step5.noteText: Location data helps provide accurate documentation and can be important for insurance claims and legal proceedings.

step6.label: Other Party
step6.title: Other Party Information
step6.description: Help us identify the other party involved in the accident for confirmation.
step6.question: Other Party Type

step7.label: Summary
step7.title: Report Summary
step7.description: Review your accident report details before finalizing.

accidentType.title: Report Your Accident
accidentType.subtitle: Fast, secure, and legally compliant accident reporting. Get your report generated in minutes with digital signatures and GPS verification.

twoVehicle.title: Two-Vehicle Accident
twoVehicle.description: Collision involving another vehicle. We'll help you connect with the other party for confirmation.

singleVehicle.title: Single-Vehicle Accident
singleVehicle.description: Solo incident with no other parties involved. Quick and simple reporting process.

photo.title: Photo Documentation
photo.description: Upload damage photos and license plates with built-in OCR

gps.title: GPS Location
gps.description: Automatic location capture with timestamp verification

pdf.title: Legal PDF Report
pdf.description: Generate legally compliant reports with digital signatures
